tuv.seg: Description=You have been trying to raise capital for your fashion startup for years.
Description=На протяжении многих лет вы пытались привлечь капитал для своего стартапа в индустрии моды.
Unfortunately the fund raising process is difficult and slow.
К сожалению, процесс поиска инвесторов труден и медлен, так что, скорее всего, на момент запуска вашей компании (предпол.
When you eventually succeed in launching your own fashion company (expected to happen in year 2000), there will be established competitors in the market.
в 2000 г.) на рынке уже будут конкуренты.
Do you have what it takes to carve out a niche with your new fashion brand and thrive in the market?
Есть ли у вас все что требуется для того, чтобы занять нишу с вашим новым модным брендом и процветать на рынке?
Alternative Stock Sim=Yes Boom-Bust Cycle Volatility=Moderate
Alternative Stock Sim=Yes

Constant Import Supply=No
Goal Description=Facing tough competition from established fashion companies, your near term goal is to stay afloat and carve out a niche with your new fashion brand.
Goal Description=Facing tough competition from established fashion companies, your near term goal is to stay afloat and curve out a niche with your new fashion brand.
